prompt_base: brilliant young woman, voluminous auburn hair, elegant oval face, realistic skin texture, cinematic studio lighting, 8k professional photo
feature_prompt: individual flowing hair strands, detailed cotton fabric, clear black-framed glasses, realistic skin pores, subsurface scattering, subtle shadows
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, plastic, doll, smooth hair, exaggerated eyes, flat lighting, low quality, blurry face, (deformed glasses:1.3), (glasses glare:1.1), (broken glasses:1.2), too much makeup
